data.name: CADET-Core
data.description: The heart of CADET. A modular, fast, and accurate modeling and simulation framework for biotechnology processes.

evidence: "CADET-Core 5.0: High-Performance Solver for Advanced Biotechnology Process Modeling" – indicates it is a domain-specific solver used for scientific modeling, i.e., an application for research tasks.
"CADET-Core can be installed via conda from the ``conda-forge`` channel. `conda install -c conda-forge cadet`" – shows distribution via the conda-forge package registry.

"The development of CADET-Core has been a collaborative effort, with multiple dedicated individuals contributing their expertise to create a powerful and versatile open-source software tool... to provide the scientific community with a valuable resource." – indicates a research-focused tool directly used in scientific work.

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
checks.name: Binary-Artifacts

documentation.short: Determines if the project has generated executable (binary) artifacts in the source repository.

checks.name: Branch-Protection

documentation.short: Determines if the default and release branches are protected with GitHub's branch protection settings.
